snippet: The government said two deaths that prompted it to stop the study had been caused by a drug used in pretreatment, not the leukemia treatment....
abstract: Food and Drug Administration permits resumption of experimental trial for leukemia treatment by Juno Therapeutics, after modification; two patients had perished from brain swelling.
lead_paragraph: The government said two deaths that prompted it to stop the study had been caused by a drug used in pretreatment, not the leukemia treatment.

headline.main: Study of Juno Therapeutics Leukemia Treatment Is Allowed to Resume
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Allows Resumption  of a Leukemia Drug Trial
